DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy tooth interproximal cleaning modality oral health .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Effect Tooth Cleaning Devices Oral Health
DOC.criteria: good/excellent health ; 18 70 year old ; minimum 20 natural teeth ( exclude 3rd molar ) ; sufficient test site ; ≥ 20 bleeding site ; willing participate available participation . systemic diseases Down 's syndrome , know AIDS/HIV ; insulin dependant Diabetes ; pregnant nursing subject report ; cardiac pacemaker undergo require extensive dental orthodontic treatment ; require antibiotic treatment dental appointment ; heavy deposit calculus ; severe gingivitis periodontitis ; extensive crown bridge work and/or rampant decay ; currently use bleach tray ; oral extraoral pierce lip mouth ; professional prophylaxis within 4 week study ; participation prior study ≤ 20 day ; employ oral healthcare product company research institution .
